body_html:
@samjabrahams
I agree with you, we should demo the dropout api but maybe in later chapters where dropout can truly work. However, if it cannot work in this demo, it does not seems to be convincing to let people use it. This is the very begining chapter, so I think we can keep it as simple as we could so that people won't feel it's too troublesome to train a model in tensorflow.

body:
@samjabrahams 
I agree with you, we should demo the dropout api but maybe in later chapters where dropout can truly work. However, if it cannot work in this demo, it does not seems to be convincing to let people use it. This is the very begining chapter, so I think we can keep it as simple as we could so that people won't feel it's too troublesome to train a model in tensorflow.
